title: RxJS asyncScheduler: async dropdown options data
desc: You are going to learn how to use RxJS asyncScheduler to delay async calls to the Api for dropdown options data, and then load the dropdown control data reactively. You can also use asapScheduler to defer the call.

title: Passing Fragments to Route | Angular Routing | Angular 13+
desc:
Fragments is that part of route which allows user to move from one section in a webpage to another section on click of a link. A fragment in URL comes after a # sumbol.
We have already talked about route parameters and query parameters. fragment is another type of parameter which a route can have and it comes after a pound sign.

title: Changing parent element of dynamic Angular component
desc: Let's assume that you want to render a loader component on top of other component while data is loading. It would be great to encapsulate logic for creating such dynamic component (loader) within a reusable directive. In fact, it's achieved in such a way in the Nebular library. In this blog post, I will cover implementation details of an analogous solution.

title: What is Child Routes in Angular | Angular Routing | Angular 13+
desc:
In this lecture, we will have a look at how to add a child or nested routes to an Angular route. Child Routes or Nested routes are a powerful new feature in the Angular router.
Nested routes are routes within other routes. In this lecture, i will show you how to create a child route and display the child components. The Angular allows us to nest child routes under another child routes effectively creating a Tree of routes.

title: How to electronify your Angular application
desc:
Angular Nation - Angular Africa

ngx-electronify is an Angular library that enables to run an Angular application into desktop mode using Electron. Electron is a cross-platform JavaScript framework for building desktop applications such as VSCode and Slack. When combined with a powerful framework such as Angular, it can produce high-quality and performant applications. In this talk, we will learn the basics of the Electron framework and how it is used in ngx-electronify to enhance the Angular development experience.
